title: ISic000446. Funerary inscription of Sporus
body:
Facsimile Images

Depositus ((·)) Sporus ((·)) V ((·)) Kal(endas) ((·)) Ian(uarias)
qui vixit annis ((·)) LIII ((·)) Deo suo
devotus ((·)) Constantia con-
iunx ob meritum eius ((·)) posuit ((·))
5cum qua convixit ((·)) annis ((·)) XII
et decessit in pace ((·)) Constan-
tio ((·)) Aug(usto) ((·)) VIII ((·)) et Iuliano Caes(are) ((·)) cons(ulibus)

Apparatus criticus

Text of CIL

translation
